text: KidsTv.

Mommy I’m scared of the dark
Of the dark, of the dark

Mommy I’m scared of the dark
Please stay with me

Mommy I’m scared of the dark
Of the dark, of the dark

Mommy I’m scared of the dark
Please stay with me

Look there is  no reason
To be scared of the dark

It’s your im-ag-in-a-tion
That’s rea-ching out far

Come up with a thought
To take the chills away

And you’ll be comfortable
Just as if it was day

Daddy I’m scared of the dark
Of the dark, of the dark

Daddy I’m scared of the dark
Please stay with me

Daddy I’m scared of the dark
Of the dark, of the dark

Daddy I’m scared of the dark
Please stay with me

Look there is  no reason
To be scared of the dark

It’s your im-ag-in-a-tion
That’s rea-ching out far

Now come up with a thought
To take the chills away

And soon you’ll be comfortable
Just as if it was day

I’m scared of the dark no more
Dark no more, Dark no more

I’m scared of the dark no more
It’s safe as can be

I’m scared of the dark no more
Dark no more, Dark no more

I’m scared of the dark no more
It’s safe as can be

You are such a brave child
We are pro-ud of you

If you put your mind to it
There’s nothing  you can’t do

Now sleep little baby
And here’s a goodnight kiss

To keep you smiling all night
With dreams full of bliss
